module.name: inertia_characteristics
module.keywords: module, center of mass, inertia matrix, moments of inertia

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of inertia properties of a shape.

uof.name: Inertia characteristics
uof.description: The Inertia characteristics UOF specifies the data structure for the representation of shape dependent inertia properties.
